definition: to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip

sentences.english: In the latter period, they were armed with Winchester rifles, clubs and knives.
sentences.chinese: 在後階段，她們還配備了連發槍以及軍棍和軍刀。

sentences.english: I want this for every cannon . How many men will you need?
sentences.chinese: 我需要配備到每門炮，你要多少人？

sentences.english: And equipped with more than a decade has experienced drivers.
sentences.chinese: 並配備有十年以上駕齡，經驗豐富的司機。

sentences.english: Ideally, people culling and disposing of birds should have protective equipment.
sentences.chinese: 宰殺和處理禽類的人應該配備保護裝置。

sentences.english: That's especially true if your employer maintains an on-site charging station.
sentences.chinese: 當你老闆配備了一臺一站式充電站時更是如此。

sentences.english: Those variants equip an organism specially well to cope with the exigencies of the environments.
sentences.chinese: 變異使生物體配備得特別完善以應付環境的嚴酷要求。

sentences.english: The second floor includes a grandstand area and lounge area.
sentences.chinese: 二層則設有看臺區，並配備專門的休息室。

sentences.english: It features a modern dual-axis accelerometer to track the magnitude of your movements.
sentences.chinese: 它配備了現代雙軸加速度跟蹤的嚴重性你的動作。

sentences.english: This telephone with an inductor call became the company’s trademark.
sentences.chinese: 這部配備感應器的電話機成了該公司的招牌產品。

sentences.english: Kitchens will be staffed by a base of full-time chefs together with a stream of trainee chefs on work experience.
sentences.chinese: 廚房將配備專職廚師，還有一些實習生。

sentences.english: The test cabinets are standard-wise equipped with a lockable main switch according to VDE.
sentences.chinese: 按照VDE標準，試驗箱配備可鎖的主電源開關。

sentences.english: It has a 3.0-megapixel camera and camcorder, and comes with 4GB of internal memory.
sentences.chinese: 機型配備3百萬像素攝像頭，內置4GB內存。

sentences.english: Apartments include free internet access and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.
sentences.chinese: 每間空調客房都配備了衛星電視和免費無線網絡連接。

sentences.english: The Moisturizing Shaving System is equipped with a dual blade system to give you an ultra close shave.
sentences.chinese: 剃的保溼系統，配備了雙刀片系統給你一個超近距離。

sentences.english: Scott led by people with a pony and Amundsen led equipped with the dogs and ski.
sentences.chinese: 斯科特率領的人與小馬和亞孟森領導配備警犬和滑雪。

sentences.english: They were enriched with the wisdom of God, and girded with the panoply of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 他們因上帝的智慧而富足，以天上的甲冑爲配備。

definition: to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
to belong or be dedicated exclusively to/proprietary/private/personal
to possess/to have/equipped with/able to fulfill (conditions or requirements)
to recharge (a battery)/(fig.) to recharge one's batteries (through leisure)/to update one's skills and knowledge
to replace (a worn-out tire etc)/to change (one's address etc)
